name: player_game_stats
description: This table contains player stats for individual games.

columns.name: min
columns.description: How many minutes a player was in the game.

columns.name: fgm
columns.description: A number of goals made by a player.

columns.name: fga
columns.description: A number of goals attempted (shots made) by a player.

columns.name: fg3m
columns.description: A number of 3-pointers made by a player.

columns.name: fg3a
columns.description: A number of attempted 3-point shots by a player.

columns.name: ftm
columns.description: A number of Free Throws made by a player.

columns.name: fta
columns.description: A number of Free Throws attempted by a player.

columns.name: oreb
columns.description: Number of offensive rebounds by a player.

columns.name: dreb
columns.description: Number of defensive rebounds by a player.

columns.name: reb
columns.description: Total number of rebounds by a player.

columns.name: ast
columns.description: Number of assists by a player.

columns.name: stl
columns.description: Number of steals by a player.

columns.name: blk
columns.description: Number of blocks by a player.

columns.name: to
columns.description: Number of turnovers by a player.

columns.name: pf
columns.description: Number of personal fouls made by a player.

columns.name: pts
columns.description: Number of points scored by a player.
